BugInstance.message: edu.pdx.cs410J.hui2.PhoneCall.formatter(String, String) invokes System.exit(...), which shuts down the entire virtual machine
edu.pdx.cs410J.hui2.PhoneCall defines compareTo(PhoneCall) and uses Object.equals()
Found reliance on default encoding in edu.pdx.cs410J.hui2.PrettyPrinter.dumpToFile(AbstractPhoneBill): new java.io.FileWriter(String, boolean)
Exceptional return value of java.io.File.createNewFile() ignored in edu.pdx.cs410J.hui2.PrettyPrinter.dumpToFile(AbstractPhoneBill)
Unused public or protected field: edu.pdx.cs410J.hui2.Project3.oldPhoneCall
Found reliance on default encoding in edu.pdx.cs410J.hui2.TextDumper.dump(AbstractPhoneBill): new java.io.FileWriter(String, boolean)
Found reliance on default encoding in edu.pdx.cs410J.hui2.TextParser.parse(): new java.io.FileReader(String)
edu.pdx.cs410J.hui2.TextParser.checkFileName(String) invokes System.exit(...), which shuts down the entire virtual machine
edu.pdx.cs410J.hui2.TextParser.createFile(String) invokes System.exit(...), which shuts down the entire virtual machine
edu.pdx.cs410J.hui2.TextParser.parse() invokes System.exit(...), which shuts down the entire virtual machine
